name: (C) Ref. Case RTU, Resist. Heat
_description: Ref. case resistance:based heating integrated in packaged rooftop unit

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of typical commercial resistance heating lifetime

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies: Appendix A
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Admnistration

notes: Includes all resistance-based heating in commercial buildings

cooling multiple of 34% was determined by dividing square feet in which cooling equipment is packaged AND heating equipment is electric or none (120416960 sf) by square feet with same cooling constraint and heating across all fuel types (357885079 sf).
